5a13876f8bf55085c847fd2b.description: Aatrox fills up his Blood Well through his abilities. When filled, Aatrox gains Blood Rush for as long as he stays in combat with champions, granting him attack damage, attack speed, and the ability to survive fatal damage.
5a13876f8bf55085c847fd2b.name: Blood Well

5a13876f8bf55085c847fd28.description: Galio gains Ability Power equal to 50% of his total Magic Resist.
5a13876f8bf55085c847fd28.name: Runic Skin

description: Moving or attacking will charge an Energized attack. Energized attacks have 1-50% Lifesteal and grant 30% Movement Speed for 0.75 seconds.
5a1384b48bf55085c847ac0e.name: Warlord's Bloodlust

5a1386178bf55085c847d3cb.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
5a1386178bf55085c847d3cb.name: Heightened Senses
5a1386178bf55085c847d3cb.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Quinn's Attack Speed and Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a1386188bf55085c847d3d5.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d5.name: Double Up
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d5.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each. Both apply on-hit effects.

The second shot can critically strike for {{ f1 }}% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f4.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f4.name: Piercing Arrow
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f4.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e7 }}%. After {{ e5 }} seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds {{ e4 }}% of its Mana cost.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum {{ e9 }}%).

Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds (affected by Varus' cooldown reduction) if the arrow detonates Blight stacks from at least one enemy champion.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f2.description: Galio claps his wings, unleashing a gust of concussive wind that damages enemies and leaves a directional draft in its wake that increases ally Movement Speed.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f2.name: Righteous Gust
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f2.tooltip: Galio unleashes a gust of concussive wind that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in its path. A directional draft then remains for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing the Movement Speed of allies following it by {{ e2 }}%.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f3.description: Galio assumes the form of a statue, taunting nearby enemies and storing concussive energy as they attack him. Galio then bursts from his statue shell, releasing the stored energy to damage surrounding foes.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f3.name: Idol of Durand
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f3.tooltip:
Galio channels for {{ e6 }} seconds, taunting nearby foes and blocking {{ e4 }}% of incoming damage.

After channeling, Galio deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, plus an additional {{ e2 }}% damage for each attack he suffered while channeling, up to a max of {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage ({{ e3 }}% bonus damage).

5a1386188bf55085c847d3d3.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d3.name: Feast
5a1386188bf55085c847d3d3.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) true damage to champions or {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health.

  • Only 5 total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: {{ f3 }}/5)

5a13861c8bf55085c847d401.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
5a13861c8bf55085c847d401.name: Dark Flight
5a13861c8bf55085c847d401.tooltip:
Aatrox takes flight and slams down at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact for {{ e4 }} second.

Aatrox fills up 20% of the Blood Well upon cast.

5a13861c8bf55085c847d402.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage and fills a portion of his Blood Well every third subsequent attack. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
5a13861c8bf55085c847d402.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
5a13861c8bf55085c847d402.tooltip:
Toggle Off: Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1*100 }}% Missing Health) Health.

Toggle On: Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and fills up 20% of the Blood Well.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f1.description: Galio shields an ally Champion, increasing their Armor and Magic Resist, and restoring Galio's Health each time that Champion suffers damage.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f1.name: Bulwark
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f1.tooltip:
Galio protects a friendly champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing their Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }}.

Each time the ally takes damage, Galio is healed for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}). Bulwark heals for {{ e4 }}% less for each consecutive hit.

5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f0.description: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, slowing and dealing damage to enemies caught near the impact point.
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f0.name: Resolute Smite
5a13861a8bf55085c847d3f0.tooltip: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f7.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f7.name: Drain
5a13861b8bf55085c847d3f7.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks creates a tether to the target unit and channels Drain on it, granting True Sight and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to the target. Fiddlesticks heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

Drain lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.
